verbose_text: Together with previous data showing that LMP2A contains two PPXY motifs and recruits Nedd4 Ub ligase to degrade Lyn kinase, these findings suggest that the cellular UPS is an important factor in the maintenance of EBV latency.
evidence: LMP2A contains two PPXY motifs and recruits Nedd4 Ub ligase to degrade Lyn
